item.description:
http://www.meetup.com...

Tom Ferrick and Joe & Barbara Gerstein of Greater Boston Humanists have invited any interested members of Greater Worcester Humanists out to GBH's annual summer barbeque! Dave Niose and a couple other GWH members will be in attendance. More information, including directions, are available at the link above. If you plan to attend, please register with GBH Director Tom Ferrick at 617-547-1497 and indicate if you will be bringing food or drink and for what course. You might also join the GBH Meetup group and RSVP there.
item.name: Join Greater Boston Humanists @ their summer barbeque!
